calculator.title: C# Calculator
calculator.description: A desktop calculator that features a programmer mode with bases 2-16 and 8-digit precision floating-point compute.

cards.title: Card Matching Game
cards.description: A C# take on the classic card matching game. Features user progress and session saving.

controller.title: Remote Control for Food Dispenser
controller.description: An Android app made in Java to control a bluetooth-controlled Arduino food dispensing truck.

restaurant.title: Desktop Restaurant App
restaurant.description: A C# WPF desktop application that offers both an administrator panel for the employees and an intuitive interface for users.

shooter.title: Topdown Retro Shooter
shooter.description: A Qt spin to the classic Battle City.
